Html:
I'm running the Windows Forms demo.

1) select an area of the map (the whole world) and then click Prefetch

2) say yes to download (ripp) a couple of Zoom levels

3) click Export to save to a file, select desktop location and filename

This last step often says "Failed!". Even when reports completed, the created file is only 6Kb. 

There seems to be a bigger file under AppData, but not sure how that file is used.

Am I missing something?

Works just fine for me, and well.. export function is more for adding new tiles to existing database while skipping tiles that already there. So if you want complete 'export', just copy database from AppData directory. And next time you can use that database to add new tiles using export function
